title: Wipro promotes Hari Shetty as chief strategist and sales officer
description: Wipro named Hari Shetty as Chief Strategist. The Bengaluru-headquartered firm makes first CXO appointment under new CEO Srinivas Pallia.
content: Indian IT major Wipro on May 2 elevated Hari Shetty as its Chief Strategist and Sales Excellence Officer from immediate effect, the company informed in an exchange filing.This is the first CXO-level appointment made by the Bengaluru-headquartered firm after the new CEO Srinivas Pallia who took charge this month on April 6 following the resignation of former CEO Thierry Delaporte.Based in the US, Shetty was until today the senior vice president & sector head for technology platforms, products & gaming at Wipro.“His expertise encompasses client engagement, strategy development, execution, and P&L oversight for his business. Hari’s profound passion for technology drives his belief in its transformative potential for businesses and society,” Wipro said in the filing.An old hand with 3 decades at Wipro, Shetty previously also played leadership roles across several industries including retail and distribution.
